titles: Crossing of prouerbs Crosse-answeres. and crosse-humours. By B.N. Gent.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: Printed [By G. Eld] for Iohn Wright, and are to be solde at his shop without Newgate, at the signe of the Bible,
notes: Collation from incomplete L copy as reported in STC.
A second part was published the same year.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
